answers.answer: I had preeclampsia with my first child I was a mess because I had to lay on my left side the whole time I was in labor with him I was in labor for a day Straight and only dilated to 5 Cm. I got to have a c section the falling day..
My doctor said I shouldn't have any problems delivering. I hope he is right. That sounds like quite the ordeal

question: So I have pregnancy hypertension. It hasnt progressed to preeclampsia yet but they dont want to take the risk since I am also extremely anemic. My doctor says not to worry and that ill be okay after shes born and that she is plenty healthy. So how many of you other moms have or have had this problem? It makes me very nervous.
title: might be having her at 37 weeks
